summary: This Mod Is VERY Simple, It Makes The Perk "QuickShot" Much More Effective I Just Thought Archers Needed A Little More Love ;)
descriptionHtml:
Requires An Up To Date Skyrim!

Made This Mod On Impulse When i Was Looking At Another Mod That Does Something Like This, Just ALOT Weaker To The Point I Didnt See The Point In Getting it, But Went All OCD On The Idea Of Pimping My Archery! XD

To Test (Or Cheat)
open console with ~  and type Help quickshot
then player.addspell QUICKSHOTIDHERE
if you do not wish to cheat, it is in the archery perk tree, this does not add another perk but edit an existing one, so complete overhauls that also edit the perk QuickShot will not work with this mod, its one or the other (the one loaded lower in your loading order will work, though i wouldnt bother having both)

Q/A
Q:    why no peetures D:?

A:    *facepalm* I Cannot ScreenShot The Bow Shooting Faster >.>
Q:  Will you make this compatible with "mod here"
A: No xD i suck at modding, this is a VEEEEEEEEEERRRRRYYY easy thing to do with the creationkit, making it compatible is pointless due to the fact if it aint compatible, it changes the exact same thing another mod does, itll take to much time for little gain as like i said, its basic :P if it isnt working with a mod you like just choose what you want more Sorry D:



Have Anything Basic You Want Added To Skyrim, Just Pm Me And Ill Try My Best! I Need To Get Better At Modding :)
author: SteamingTooner
